```{r setup, include=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F,
                      fig.path = 'figures/',
                      dev = 'tikz')
library(magrittr)
```

```{r price2, eval = T}
funcprice = function(s, c0, s0, f) {
  c0 / (f * s) * ((s / s0) ^ (1 / f))
}

cols = c('green', 'grey10', 'red', 'blue')
c0s = c(15)
s0s = c(60)
fs = c(0.8, 0.5, 0.2)
ymax = 0.6

par(cex = 1.1, mgp = c(2, 1, 0))
lwds = 2

slinst = c(10 ^ seq(-16, 0, 0.5) , seq(2, 110, 1))

for (c0 in c0s) {
  for (s0 in s0s) {
    plot(
      slinst,
      funcprice(slinst, c0, s0, fs[1]),
      col = cols[1],
      type = 'l',
      xlim = c(0, max(slinst)),
      ylim = c(0, ymax),
      xlab = "Post-tx outstanding token supply $s$",
      ylab = "Token price $P(s)$",
      bty = 'l',
      lwd = lwds
    )
    for (i in 2:length(fs)) {
      lines(slinst,
            funcprice(slinst, c0, s0, fs[i]),
            col = cols[i],
            lwd = lwds)
    }
    abline(v = s0, lwd = 4, lty = 2)
    text(
      x = s0 + 0.5,
      y = ymax,
      labels = paste0('Pre-tx\noutstanding\ntoken supply\n$s_0=', s0, '$'),
      xpd = T,
      adj = c(0, 0)
    )
    text(
      x = 0,
      y = ymax,
      labels = paste0('Pre-tx stablecoin reserve\n$C_0=', c0, '$'),
      xpd = T,
      adj = c(0, 0)
    )
  }
}

legend(
  'bottomright',
  col = cols,
  title = 'Stablecoin\nreserve\nfraction $F$',
  lty = 1,
  legend = paste0('$', fs, '$'),
  bty = 'n',
  xpd = T,
  lwd = lwds,
  title.adj = 1
)
```


